MQA.Declutter

Constructs an MQA.Declutter object.  The MQA.Declutter object controls how the MQA.Poi declutter functionality operates.  The MQA.Declutter object is accessed via the MQA.TileMap.getDeclutter() method of the MQA.TileMap object.

Note

The MQA.Declutter object is automatically created with an MQA.TileMap.  There is no need to explicitly create one.

Parameters

mapMQA.TileMap The MQA.TileMap to attach.

Returns

n/a

Functions

setDeclutterMode

Sets the declutter mode for this map.

Parameters

declutterMode(int) The declutter mode to set.  Valid values are 0 (no declutter), 1 (stack decluttering), and 2 (leader-line decluttering).

Returns

n/a

See Also

getDeclutterMode

getDeclutterMode

Returns the declutter mode for this map.

Parameters

none

Returns

int

See Also

setDeclutterMode

setDeclutterIcon

Sets the declutter icon to use for this map for mode 1.

Parameters

url(string) The image URL string.
width(int) The width size of the declutter icon image in pixels.
height(int) The height size of the declutter icon image in pixels.

Returns

n/a

See Also

getDeclutterIcon

setStackHeight

Sets the height (in icons) of the decluttered poi grouping for mode 1.  The default is 2.  Minimum is 1.

Parameters

height(int) The height of the decluttered poi grouping.

Returns

n/a

See Also

getStackHeight, setStackWidth, getStackWidth

getStackHeight

Returns the stack height setting of the MQA.Declutter object for mode 1.

Parameters

none

Returns

int

See Also

setStackHeight, setStackWidth, getStackWidth

setStackWidth

Sets the width (in icons) of the decluttered poi grouping for mode 1.  The default is 5.  Minimum is 2.

Parameters

width(int) The width of the decluttered poi grouping.

Returns

n/a

setRolloverDrag

Sets whether to drag the rollover with the poi.  Default is true.

Parameters

drag(boolean) True to include the rollover with the poi drag, false otherwise..

Returns

n/a

See Also

getRolloverDrag

getRolloverDrag

Returns the drag status of rollovers.

Parameters

none

Returns

boolean

See Also

setRolloverDrag

setLeaderLineColor

Sets the color of the declutter mode 2 leader line.  Default is #000000.

Parameters

color(string) Hex value of the leaderline color.

Returns

n/a

See Also

<getLeaderLineColor>

setLeaderLineDotMode

Specifies how to draw the leader line reference dot.  Default is 1 (drawn dot).

Parameters

mode(int) Mode to use for reference point.  0 = no dot, 1 = draw dot, 2 = dot image.

See Also

getLeaderLineDotMode

getLeaderLineDotMode

Returns the draw status of the leader line reference dot.

Parameters

none

Returns

int

See Also

<setDrawLeaderLineDot>

setLeaderLineDotImage

Sets the leader line dot image.

Parameters

url(string) Full url to the image.
width(int) Width of the image.
height(int) Height of the image.

Returns

n/a

See Also

getLeaderLineDotImage

getLeaderLineDotImage

Returns the leader line dot image.

Parameters

none

MQA.Icon
